pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data for Multilevel Regression and Poststratification // Data for package Multilevel Regressions and Poststratification (MRP) U.S. States and Territories map data (spmap.states) Combined 2004-2005 poll data: support for same-sex civil marriage (samesexmarriage) US Census Public Use Microdata Sample (PUMS) for Poststratification (mrp.census) States and Regions for MRP (mrp.region) CCES.complete
